metadata.name: Dhyāna
metadata.description:
Dhyāna (Sanskrit: ध्यान, Pali: झान) means "contemplation, reflection" and "profound, abstract meditation”

This piece was created to embody the fluctuations of the mind, the intuitive power within, the sources of light, love and imagination that we can access when we take the  time to be still with ourselves and connect to source.

To understand the immeasurable, the mind must be extraordinarily quiet, still.
― Jiddu Krishnamurti


Mixed Media, Digital Collage and Digital Painting.
